skills_passive.en: When an enemy uses an item, Freeze it for 0.5/1 second(s).

Icy.effect_cn: 此物品的冻结持续时间翻倍。

skills_passive.en: When you use a Property, increase its value by 2/3 times this item's value for the fight.
skills_passive.cn: 使用地产时，此地产价值提高，增幅等于此物品价值的2/3倍（限本场战斗）。

Heavy.effect_en: When you use an adjacent Property, Slow an item for 1 second(s).
Heavy.effect_cn: 使用相邻地产时，减速一件物品1秒。

Icy.effect_en: When you use an adjacent Property, Freeze an item for 0.5 second(s).
Icy.effect_cn: 使用相邻地产时，冻结一件物品0.5秒。

Turbo.effect_en: When you use an adjacent Property, Haste an item for 1 second(s).

Shielded.effect_cn: 使用相邻地产时，获得20护盾。

Restorative.effect_en: When you use an adjacent Property, Heal 20.
Restorative.effect_cn: 使用相邻地产时，获得20治疗。

Toxic.effect_en: When you use an adjacent Property, Poison 2.
Toxic.effect_cn: 使用相邻地产时，造成2剧毒。

Fiery.effect_en: When you use an adjacent Property, Burn 2.
Fiery.effect_cn: 使用相邻地产时，造成2灼烧。

Shiny.effect_en: Increases the value of the Property by an additional 100%.

Deadly.effect_en: Your adjacent Properties have +Crit Chance equal to the value of your highest value item.
Deadly.effect_cn: 相邻地产 + 暴击率，增幅等于价值最高物品的价值。

Radiant.effect_en: Your adjacent Properties are affected by Freeze and Slow for half as long.
Radiant.effect_cn: 相邻地产受到的冻结和减速效果时长减半。

Obsidian.effect_en: When you use an adjacent Property, deal 20 Damage.
Obsidian.effect_cn: 使用相邻地产时，造成20伤害。
